data.title: Xander Berkeley Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Xander Berkeley with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Began acting as a child in experimental theater

Is a classically trained theater actor who studied with, among others, Lee Strasberg

Made his film debut as Christopher Crawford in 1981's Mommie Dearest

In 1987 worked on a film in Nicaragua during the Contra War

Met his future wife, Sarah Clarke, on the first day of filming the pilot of 24

Is also a painter, sculptor and makeup artist
